Package FX.Model.Entities.Brick

Class Crack

java.lang.Object
FX.Model.Entities.Brick.Crack
public class Crack
extends java.lang.Object
this class is used to make a crack path for the brick.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • singletonCrack

      public static Crack singletonCrack()
      this method is used to create a one and only crack object and return it. based on singleton design pattern
      Returns:
      this returns a one and only crack class object.

    • prepareCrack

      public void prepareCrack​(javafx.geometry.Point2D point, int direction, Brick brick)
      This method is used to calculate and determine where to draw the crack to based on the direction provided.
      Parameters:
      point - the point where the ball comes in contact with.
      direction - the direction where the ball touch the brick.
      brick - this is the brick where it will get the boundary of the brick to set the position of the opposite edge of collision

    • makeCrack

      public void makeCrack​(javafx.geometry.Point2D start, javafx.geometry.Point2D end, Brick brick)
      this method is used to make the crack path.
      Parameters:
      start - this is the start point where the crack is going to start.
      end - this is the end point where the crack is going to end.
      brick - this is the brick where the crack path will be saved to.

    • makeRandomPointBetween

      public javafx.geometry.Point2D makeRandomPointBetween​(javafx.geometry.Point2D oppositeOfCollisionCornerPoint1, javafx.geometry.Point2D oppositeOfCollisionPoint2, int direction)
      this method is used to create a random point based on the direction provided.
      Parameters:
      oppositeOfCollisionCornerPoint1 - this is the position where it begins.
      oppositeOfCollisionPoint2 - this is the position where it ends.
      direction - the direction using an integer constant.
      Returns:
      it returns a random point (coordinate) on the brick.

    • getRnd

      public java.util.Random getRnd()
      this method is used to get the crack object used to have a randomness on the crack path.
      Returns:
      this returns a random object.

    • setRnd

      public void setRnd​(java.util.Random rnd)
      this method is used to set a random object into a variable for future reference.
      Parameters:
      rnd - this is the random object used to set into a variable.

    • getVERTICAL

      public int getVERTICAL()
      this method is used to get a constant which is an integer constant for the vertical direction.
      Returns:
      this returns a constant to indicate the direction axis.

    • getHORIZONTAL

      public int getHORIZONTAL()
      this method is used to get a constant which is an integer constant for the horizontal direction.
      Returns:
      this returns a constant to indicate the direction axis.
